content: Would be nice to get a review from someone here: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/73943/files (i hope it belongs here :P )
I’m the author of this PR, do not hesitate to ping me if needed :slight_smile:
(Or on discord, same nickname, or GitHub, same nickname again)
Hmm idk if writing "compiler intrinsics" explicitly in the unsafe doc is the best idea, as most of the intrinsics also require nightly
I changed the wording to « some compiler intrinsics »
